name: irreplaceable
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
too special, unusual, or valuable to replace with something or someone else: Most of the porcelain you see in the display cabinets is irreplaceable. No one's irreplaceable in the workplace.

Add to word list
Add to word list
too special, unusual, or valuable to replace with something else, or of which no others like it exist: irreplaceable documents No one on this team is irreplaceable, the new manager insisted.
